title: LF Top Lane/Jungle Bronze for ranked team
body:
serious team looking to climb and make a name for ourselves one day looking for player to fill vacancy. Please use skype to communicate with team mates and dont flame as we are all learning to get ahead someday and make the dream. if this interests you and youre willing to commit and play often hit me up in game for position

streams also active 
-ThreshXG
